description:
BPŠ mBanka aplikacija namenjena fizičkim licima je digitalni servis, koji vam omogućava da Banka bude uvek u vašim rukama i dostupna 24/7, bez obzira gde se nalazite. Novo rešenje omogućava bezbedno i brzo logovanje, potpuni nadzor nad finansija i brojne druge pogodnosti.

Mobilna aplikacija BPŠ Banke omogućava vam da brzo, jednostavno i sigurno obavite svakodnevne bankarske transakcije bez odlaska na šalter. 

Korisnicima su u aplikaciji dostupne brojne mogućnosti:



- Pregled stanja po svim računima, karticama, štednji i kreditima
- Upravljajte limitima na vašim karticama
- Podela na rate kreditnim karticama
- Promena PIN-a platne kartice
- Plaćanje u dinarima sa zakazivanjem u budućnosti
- Prenos novca između vaših računa u Banci
- Plaćanje putem IPS skeniraj ili očitavanjem QR kod putem IPS pokaži
- Prenos novca putem broja mobilnog telefona putem „Prenesi“
- Kupovina i prodaja stranih valuta 
- Sačuvani detalji šabloni i primoca naloga za brže plaćanja
- Lokacije sa navigacijom vama najbliže ekspoziture ili bankomata Banke
- Ugovaranje trajnih naloga i elektronsko plaćanje komunalnih usluga 
- Upravljanje korisničkim profilom
- Prijava sa biometrijskom autentifikacijom
- Kontrola obaveštenja
- Direktnu i dvsomernu komunikacija sa Bankom
- Informacije o proizvodima i uslugama



Uživajte u inovativnom korišćenju aplikacije na pravi način i u svim pogodnostima unapređenog digitalnog bankarstva, koje vam omogućava BPŠ Banka.

Kako bi bili još bolji, pozivamo vas da nam pomognete u tome tako što će te ostaviti recenziju nakon korišćenja aplikacije.

Hvala vam što koristite BPŠ mBanking aplikaciju!

Yettel Bank je prva prava mobilna i digitalna banka u regionu, koja svakodnevno bankarstvo čini jasnim, transparentnim i jedinstvenim.

Svoje bankarske poslove možeš jednostavno da obaviš u ovoj aplikaciji:

· Podnošenje zahteva za otvaranje računa

· Podešavanje limita

· Upravljanje karticama

· Plaćanje računa na klik

· Preuzimanje potvrde o izvršenom plaćanju

· Otvaranje i upravljanje štednim računima

Ostani uz nas i istraži zašto nismo isti kao drugi! Menjamo bankarstvo, jer znamo da ti treba nešto drugačije i bolje.


Yettel Bank is the first true mobile and digital bank in the region, which makes day-to-day banking simple, transparent, and unique.

You can easily do your banking in this application:

· Submitting a request to open current account

· Limit management

· Card management

· Bills on click

· Receipt of payment confirmation

· Opening and management of savings accounts

Stay tuned and explore why are we unlike other banks! We are changing banking, because we know you need something different and better.

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK residents only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are

- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way

- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying

Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)

- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend

- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control

- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money

How we protect your money

- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.

Moja mBanka Raiffeisen – Mobilno bankarstvo bez granica!

Moja mBanka Raiffeisen objedinjuje najbolje od mobilnog bankarstva za fizička i pravna lica. Instalirajte aplikaciju, otvorite potpuno besplatno iRačun za 15 minuta iz udobnosti doma i postanite naš klijent.
Zakoračite u budućnost bankarstva kao fizičko ili pravno lice.

Fizička lica

Održavanje iRačuna je 0 dinara, a uz digitalne, fizičke kartice stižu na kućnu adresu. Besplatne prenose u dinarima realizujte za 10 sekundi.

Neke od funkcionalnosti:

•	Push obaveštenja za promene po računima
•	Logovanje i potvrda plaćanja skeniranjem lica ili otiskom prsta
•	Inbox za komunikaciju sa bankom
•	Plaćanje računa skeniranjem QR koda i kreiranje šablona
•	Kupoprodaja valuta
•	Privremena blokada kartica i pregled podataka
•	Automatska kategorizacija troškova u opciji Moje finansije
•	Podizanje gotovine bez kartice uz QR kod i Mobilni Keš
•	Plaćanja ka inostranstvu i potvrde priliva
•	Praćenje ulaganja u investicione i penzijske fondove
•	Ugovaranje proizvoda u opciji Onlajn ponuda.

Poslovni korisnici

Moja mBanka Biznis Raiffeisen omogućava malim preduzećima i preduzetnicima da otvore više vrsta računa bez odlaska u banku - dinarski Biznis iRačun, devizni račun za ino prilive, devizni račun za kupovinu deviza i račun bolovanja.

Održavanje Biznis iRačuna je besplatno prvih 12 meseci, a platne kartice stižu na odabranu adresu.

Neke od funkcionalnosti:

•	Dinarska plaćanja skeniranjem IPS QR koda
•	Integracija sa Sistemom elektronskih faktura
•	Generisanje IPS QR koda za bržu naplatu
•	Preuzimanje prometa i izvoda
•	Devizna plaćanja uz preuzimanje SWIFT potvrda
•	Pravdanje Loro priliva
•	Podnošenja zahteva i ugovaranje dodatnih usluga

Za dodatne informacije:
•	E-mail: rol.support@raiffeisenbank.rs

•	Telefon: +381 11 3202100.

********
Moja mBanka Raiffeisen – Mobile banking without limits!

Moja mBanka Raiffeisen combines the best of mobile banking for private individuals and legal entities. Install the app, open iRačun free of charge in 15 minutes from the comfort of your home and become our client.
Step into the future of banking as an individual user or a legal entity.

For individual users

The iRačun maintenance fee is 0 dinars and along with the digital, the physical payment cards are sent to the client’s home address. Perform free of charge dinar transfers in 10 seconds.

Some of the functionalities:

•	Push notifications for account movements
•	Login and payment verification by face scanning or fingerprint recognition
•	Inbox for communicating with the bank
•	Bill payment by QR code scanning or creating predefined payments
•	FX purchase and selling
•	Temporary card blocking and data overview
•	Automatic categorization of expenditures in My finance option
•	Withdrawing cash without cards by using QR codes and the Mobile Cash option
•	FX international payments and verifications of incoming payments
•	Monitoring investments into investment and pension funds
•	Receiving quotes for products via the Online offer option.

For business users

Raiffeisen Moja mBanka Business enables small enterprises and entrepreneurs to open several types of accounts without visiting the bank – dinar Business iRačun, FX account for incoming international payments, FX account for purchasing foreign currency and sick leave account.

Business iRačun maintenance is free of charge in the first 12 months and payment cards are sent to the address of your choice.

Some of the functionalities:
•	Domestic payments by scanning IPS QR code
•	Integration with the Electronic invoice System
•	Generating IPS QR codes for faster payment collection
•	Downloading account turnover and statements
•	FX payments with SWIFT confirmations
•	Justifying Loro incoming payments
•	Submitting requests and contracting additional services through the app

For additional information, please contact us:
•	E-mail: rol.support@raiffeisenbank.rs
•	Phone No.: +381 11 3202100

M-bank aplikacija omogućava Vam da brzo, jednostavno i sigurno pristupite svojim računima i izvršite transakcije, bilo kada i bilo gde.

Funkcionalnosti:

Pregled računa
Plaćanja, uz niže naknade
IPS QR Plaćanja
Slanje novca
Pregled kartica
Pregled kredita i rata
Menjačnica, po povoljnijem kursu
Svet popusta
Svet zabave
Kupovina osiguranja
Poruke - za komunikaciju sa bankom


M-bank enables you to access your accounts and execute banking transactions anytime and anywhere, in a simple, fast and secure manner.

Functionalities:

Accounts overview
Payments, at lower fees
IPS QR Payments
Cards overview
Loan and installments overview
Exchange of foreign currency 24/7, at a favourable exchange rate
Discount club
Money transfer
Insurance buying
Messages - for communication with the Bank

ENG: NLB Pay is a mobile wallet app that facilitates secure, quick, and contactless payments. It allows financial management, card security options, transaction tracking, and making payments from your smartphone. The app features Flik instant payments for immediate money transfer using phone numbers or email addresses, and QR code payments in stores. It integrates seamlessly with Apple Wallet for NLB cards and provides instant transaction updates via push notifications.

SLO: NLB Pay je mobilna denarnica, ki omogoča varna, hitra in brezstična plačila s pametnimi telefoni in napravami. Omogoča tudi dvigovanje gotovine na brezstičnih bančnih avtomatih, varnostno upravljanje kartic in sledenje transakcijam. Aplikacija vključuje Flik takojšnja plačila za takojšnji prenos denarja s pomočjo telefonskih številk ali e-poštnih naslovov ter plačila s QR kodo v trgovinah. Brezhibno se integrira z Apple Walletom za NLB kartice in omogoča takojšnje obveščanje o transakcijah preko potisnih sporočil.
Uporabniki lahko povežejo račune NLB bank, trenutno podprto za banki NLB Slovenija in NLB Črna Gora. NLB kartice je sedaj mogoče dodati neposredno v Apple Wallet prek aplikacije.

SR:

Mobilno bankarstvo Banca Intesa - banka pod vašim prstima.    
Nova aplikacija. Nove funkcionalnosti. Novo, unapređeno iskustvo u obavljanju vaših svakodnevnih transakcija!

Kontrola i upravljanje novcem

• Uzmite keš kredit i dozvoljeno prekoračenje računa 
• Pratite sve aktivnosti u vezi sa računima i svim proizvodima putem notifikacija
• Proverite status vašeg kredita i štednje kad god poželite
• Podižite gotovinu na bankomatima bez upotrebe kartice, uz #withCASH
• Koristite vašu virtuelnu karticu za bezbednu internet kupovinu 
• Upravljajte limitima potrošnje na vašim karticama
• Obavljajte kupoprodaju evra

Brzo i jednostavno plaćanje 

• Plaćajte bilo gde u svetu jednostavnije nego ikada pre
• Obavite plaćanje ili generišite vaš QR kod bez otvaranja aplikacije 
• Besplatno koristite Apple Pay uslugu za beskontaktna plaćanja 
• Kreirajte platni nalog s plaćanjem u budućnosti
• Kreirajte ili otkažite trajni nalog za pružaoce određenih usluga

Personalizujte svoju aplikaciju

• Izaberite TOP 5 prečica za najčešće korišćene funkcije
• Proverite stanje izabranog računa bez prijavljivanja na aplikaciju
• Koristite opcije skeniranja lica ili otiska prsta za brzu registraciju i obavljanje transakcije
• Pratite notifikacije o svim aktivnostima na vašim računima

Bezbednost i sigurnost

• Podaci o vašem računu i PIN se ne čuvaju u mobilnom telefonu
• Nakon tri pogrešno uneta PIN-a, aplikacija se zaključa, čime je dodatno zaštićena od neželjenog pristupa
• Otisak prsta ili prepoznavanje lica se koriste za brže i bezbednije prijavljivanje i odobravanje transakcija

Aplikaciju možete da koristite za pregled lokacija bankomata i ekspozitura, kao i kontakt podataka Banke, kada god su vam potrebni čak i ako niste naš klijent.

EN:

Banca Intesa mobile banking - bank at your fingertips.   
New app. New functionalities. New, improved experience in performing your everyday banking transactions!

Control and manage your money

• Get a cash loan and overdraft 
• Track all activities related to accounts and all other products through notifications
• Have credit and savings overview anytime you want
• Withdraw money on ATMs without the card by using #withCASH
• Use your Virtual card to shop safely online 
• Manage spending limits on your cards
• Buy and sell money in the foreign currency

Pay quick and easy 

• Make worldwide payments easier than ever before
• Pay instantly or generate your QR code without opening your app 
• Use Apple Pay for contactless payments with your Apple device 
• Set a future payment date in the payment order
• Create and cancel standing orders for selected service providers 

Personalize your app

• Select TOP 5 shortcuts for the most commonly used functionalities
• Check the balance of the selected account without logging in to the mobile app
• Use a fingerprint or face ID to quickly register and authorize transactions
• Get real time notifications for activities on your accounts

Safety & security

• All data related to accounts and PIN are not saved on the mobile phone
• After three repeated inputs of the wrong PIN, the app becomes locked and it is further secured from unwanted access
• Fingerprint or face ID is used for quicker and safer login and authorization of the transactions

You can use our app even if you're not our client, so you'll have the overview of our ATMs and branches as well as the Bank's contacts available when you need them.

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

16 million+ customers send, receive, spend and grow their money internationally with Wise. It’s the fast, simple way to move money in 160 countries and 40 currencies. Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com or download the app to see what’s available for you.

— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, like on Google, for every money transfer
• On average, 64% of transfers arrive in under 20 seconds, and 95% arrive within 24 hours
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics

— The debit card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160+ countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details

— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction

— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the real exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts

— Put your money to work with Assets —
• Try Interest or Stocks in a few taps. Available in the UK, Singapore and multiple EEA countries, for now
• Capital at risk, growth not guaranteed

— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more

Wise is regulated by local authorities around the world.

Send from: GBP (British pound), EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), AUD (Australian dollar), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), JPY (Japanese yen), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (New Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar)
Send to: EUR (Euro), USD (US dollar), GBP (British pound), AED (UAE dirham), ARS (Argentine peso), AUD (Australian dollar), BDT (Bangladeshi taka), BGN (Bulgarian lev), BRL (Brazilian real), CAD (Canadian dollar), CHF (Swiss franc), CLP (Chilean peso), CNY (Chinese yuan), CRC (Costa Rican colón), CZK (Czech koruna), DKK (Danish krone), EGP (Egyptian pound), GHS (Ghanaian cedi), GEL (Georgian lari), HKD (Hong Kong dollar), HUF (Hungarian forint), IDR (Indonesian rupiah), ILS (Israeli shekel), INR (Indian rupee), JPY (Japanese yen), KES (Kenyan shilling), KRW (South Korean won), LKR (Sri Lankan rupee), MAD (Moroccan dirham), MXN (Mexican peso), MYR (Malaysian ringgit), NPR (Nepalese rupee), NOK (Norwegian krone), NZD (New Zealand dollar), PEN (Peruvian sol), PHP (Philippine peso), PKR (Pakistan rupee), PLN (Polish zloty), RON (Romanian leu), SEK (Swedish krona), SGD (Singapore dollar), THB (Thai baht), TRY (Turkish lira), UAH (Ukrainian hryvnia), VND (Vietnamese dong), ZAR (South African rand), ZMW (Zambian kwacha)

Capital at risk. Past performance does not guarantee future growth. Interest is an investment service, availability and provider vary by location. Please check Wise.com/interest for more information.

Splitwise is the easiest way to share expenses with friends and family and stop stressing about “who owes who”. Millions of people around the world use Splitwise to organize group bills for households, trips, and more. Our mission is to reduce the stress and awkwardness that money places on our most important relationships.
 
Splitwise is great for:
- Roommates splitting rent and apartment bills
- Group trips around the world
- Splitting a vacation house for skiing or at the beach
- Weddings and bachelor/bachelorette parties
- Couples sharing relationship costs
- Friends and co-workers who go out to lunch or dinner together frequently
- Loans and IOUS between friends 
- And so much more
 
Splitwise is simple to use:
- Create groups or private friendships for any splitting situation
- Add expenses, IOUs, or informal debts in any currency, with support for offline entry
- Expenses are backed up online so everyone can log in, view their balances, and add expenses
- Keep track of who should pay next, or settle up by recording cash payments or using our integrations
 
We also have powerful features that can handle almost any money sharing situation. Here are some of our industry-leading features:
- Multi-platform support for smartphones and web
- Simplify debts into the easiest repayment plan
- Expense categorization
- Calculate group totals
- Export to CSV
- Comment directly on expenses
- Split expenses equally or unequally by percentages, shares, or exact amounts
- Add informal debts and IOUs
- Create bills that reccur monthly, weekly, yearly, fortnightly
- Add multiple payers on a single expense
- See total balances with a person across multiple groups and private expenses
- Custom user avatars
- Cover photos for groups 
- Activity feed and push notifications help you stay on top of changes
- View your edit history for changes to an expense
- Any deleted group or bill can be restored easily
- World-class customer support
- Pay back using our integrated payments: Venmo and PayPal (US only), Paytm (India only)
- 100+ currencies and growing
- 7+ supported languages

Endorsements:
“Makes it easy to split everything from your dinner bill to rent.” - NY Times
"Fundamental for tracking finances. As good as WhatsApp for containing awkwardness." – The Financial Times
“I never fight with roommates over bills because of this genius expense-splitting app”- Business Insider
“The Single Best App You Can Download for Group Trips of Any Kind” - Thrillist
“Life Changing! I don’t review many things, but this app has seriously improved my quality of life. It has saved my sanity when it comes to splitting utilities, mortgage, groceries, dog expenses...the list goes on. No more saving receipts, making spreadsheets, and manually calculating each month. So handy for group trips/weekends, too! THANK YOU!!” – Courtney via the App Store

We offer in-app purchases for “Splitwise Pro”, the benefits of which are described below. The subscription amount will be charged to your App Store account and will vary by plan and country. You’ll see the total price before completing your first payment. If you don’t choose to purchase “Splitwise Pro”, you can continue using Splitwise for free.

Premium Subscription Service “Splitwise Pro”:
1. Store high-resolution receipts in the cloud (10GB cloud storage)
2. OCR integration for scanning and itemizing receipts
3. Backups to JSON, downloadable from our website
4. Convert expenses to different currencies using our Open Exchange Rates integration
5. Access to “spending by category” budgeting tools and other charts
6. Search full expense history

“Splitwise Pro” subscriptions purchased in-app renew monthly or yearly depending on your plan. Plan pricing may vary by country. To avoid renewal, you must turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before your subscription ends. You can turn off auto-renew at any time by visiting the App Store.

Terms of Service and Privacy Policy: https://www.splitwise.com/terms

NLB mKlik omogućava vam da obavljate sve finansijske transakcije putem vašeg mobilnog uređaja u bilo koje vreme i na bilo kom mestu na brz, jednostavan i siguran način. Usluge su dostupne 24 sata, sedam dana u nedelji. Sve što vam je potrebno je mobilni uređaj i internet konekcija.

NLB mKlik vam nudi sledeće opcije:

· Provera stanja i prometa na računima i platnim karticama
· Slanje izvoda sa računa za dinarske i devizne račune na registrovanu email adresu
· Obavljanje plaćanja i transfer novca uz mogućnost slanja potvrde o plaćanju za završene transakcije
· Plaćanje putem PRENESI usluge unošenjem mobilnog telefonskog broja registrovanog od strane primaoca sredstava za ovu uslugu
· Registracija za PRENESI uslugu
· DEEP LINK usluga
· Podnošenje ONLINE zahteva za određene proizvode i usluge, realizacija bez odlaska u filijalu
· Kupovina/prodaja deviza
· Lokator bankomata i filijala
· Mogućnost kreiranja šablona za plaćanja
· Pregled štednje sa fiksnim rokom
· Pregled kredita i pripadajućih detalja
· Dopuna prepaid salda na mobilnom telefonu kod domaćih operatera
· Primanje komunikacije od banke, informacije o transakcijama na računu putem PUSH obaveštenja i kontakt sa bankom putem emaila, društvenih mreža ili telefona
· Administracija platnih kartica
· Postavke za prijavu i autentifikaciju putem prepoznavanja lica

Napomena: Ako već koristite NLB eKlik, možete sami pokrenuti slanje aktivacionog koda za NLB mKlik u trenutnom podešavanju na vašem eKlik korisničkom nalogu. Takođe postoji mogućnost da pozovete kontakt centar radi dobijanja novog aktivacionog koda. Unapređene funkcionalnosti mKlik-a mogu se koristiti na uređajima koji imaju preinstaliran OS 15.0 ili noviji.

------------------------------------------------------

NLB mKlik enables you to perform all the financial transactions via your mobile device at any time and place in a fast, easy and safe way. The services is available 24 hours, seven days a week. All you need to have is mobile device and internet connection. 

NLB mKlik offers you the following options: 

- Check the balance and turnover on accounts and payment cards 
- Sending of account statements for domestic and foreign currency accounts to registered email address 
- Perform payment and money transfer with an option of sending payment confirmation for completed payments 
- Payment via the PRENESI services by entering the mobile phone number registered by the recipient of funds for this service 
- Register for the PRENESI service 
- DEEP LINK service 
- Submitting an ONLINE request for certain products and services, realisation without going to the Branch 
- Purchase/sell foreign currencies 
- ATM and branch locator 
- The ability to create payment templates 
- Summary overview of fixed term savings 
- Loans overview and the supporting details 
- Top up the prepaid balance on mobile phone with domestic operators 
- To receive communication from the bank, info about account transactions through PUSH notifications and contact the Bank via e-mail, social networks or telephone 
- Payment cards administration 
- Login and authentication option settings for face recognition 

Note: If you are already using NLB eKlik, you can initiate sending the activation code for NLB mKlik yourself within the current Setup on your eKlik user account. There is also the possibility to call the contact center to receive a new activation code. Improved functionalities of mKlik can be used on devices which have preinstalled OS 15.0 or higher.

Koristite mBanking, gde su usluge i proizvodi naše banke uvek uz vas, za sve što vam je važno, u pokretu, kod kuće, na putovanjima, bez potrebe odlaska u banku.
Zavolećete brz pristup aplikaciji skeniranjem lica ili otiskom prsta, pregledan dizajn i sigurnost.
mBanking aplikacija UniCredit Banke dostupna je svim klijentima koji imaju otvoren tekući račun u UniCredit Banci.

• Obavljajte vaše svakodnevne bankarske transakcije i saznajte sve o vašim troškovima.
• Povoljniji kurs za kupovinu i prodaju deviza Euro valute za korisnike sa deviznim Euro računom
• Brzo proverite stanje, bez logovanja u aplikaciju.
• Platite račune, obavljajte kupovine i na kraju meseca pogledajte na šta najviše trošite, ili napravite šablone za najfrekventnija plaćanja.
• IPS QR kod za plaćanje na prodajnom mestu
• Koristite opciju skeniraj i plati, i ubrzajte unos cifara sa vaših računa.
• Prenesi – prebacite novac drugoj osobi koristeći njegov/njen broj telefona iz vaše kontakt liste.
• Kreiranje i izmena trajnog naloga
• Pregled svih vaših računa (tekućih, deviznih i štednih), kredita, platnih kartica i dokumentacije.
• Locirajte najbliže ekspoziture i bankomate.
• Iskoristite mKeš opciju u aplikaciji i podignite novac sa bankomata, bez platne kartice.
• Blokirajte i deblokirajte Vaše kreditne kartice i debitne kartice, po potrebi.
• Promena limita na debitnoj kartici
• Pogledajte PIN vaše platne kartice.
• Aplicirajte za proizvode banke, koji su vam potrebni za vaše planove.
• Aktivirajte vaš eBanking nalog, uz mToken.
• Budite obavešteni o novitetima, kroz notifikacije u aplikaciji.
• Izaberite na koji način želite da komunicirate sa bankom: mBanking/eBanking, E-mail i pošta.
• Kupovina Putnog osiguranja bez dolaska u ekspozituru
• Virtuelna debitna i kreditna kartica sa svim detaljima neophodnim za uspešno plaćanje
• Dodavanje Mastercard kreditnih i debitnih kartica u Apple novčanik direktno iz mBanking aplikacije.
• Tutorijali za lakše snalaženje u aplikaciji.

 -------------------------------------------------

Use mBanking, where Bank’s services and products are always at a hand, for all that matters to you, while you are on the go, at home, or while travelling, with no need to go to the Bank.
You will enjoy fast access to the app by using face ID or fingerprint, clear design and security.
UniCredit Bank’s mBanking app is available to all clients who have open current accounts in UniCredit Bank.

• Do your everyday transactions and find out all details about your expenses.
• Favorable exchange rate for buying and selling Euro currency for users with Euro account
• Check your account balance fast, without logging into application.
• Pay your bills, or shopping orders and have an overview of what are your biggest spending on a monthly basis, or make templates for most frequent payments.
• IPS QR code for point of sale payment
• Use scan and pay option to speed up inserting data from your bills.
• Prenesi - transfer money to another person using his/her phone number from your contact list.
• Create and modify Standing order
• Have an overview of your accounts (current, savings), loans, payment cards and documents.
• Find out where are our nearest branch offices or ATMs.
• Use mCash option to withdraw money from ATMs, without using your payment card.
• Block and unblock your credit and debit cards, if needed.
• Change limit on your debit card
• View PIN of your debit/credit cards.
• Apply for Bank’s products, for plans that matter to you.
• Activate your eBanking account, using mToken.
• Stay informed on all novelties, by receiving app’s notifications.
• Choose how you want to stay in touch with the Bank: via mBanking, eBanking, email or mail.
• Purchasing and activation of Travel insurance without going to the branch
• Virtual debit and credit card with all details needed for successful payment
• Add your Mastercard debit and credit card to Apple wallet from your mBanking app.
• Tutorials.

Erste Bank's mobile banking provides you with a range of functionalities designed in accordance with modern technologies, so that they meet all your needs.

With the Erste mBanking application, whether you are a client or not, you can:
- find the nearest branch with the help of navigation and get basic information - contact phone, email address, working hours,
- find the nearest Erste or Multicard ATM,
- contact the bank,
- get information about the current exchange rate list,
- view the product catalog.

Mbanking financial services for Erste Bank clients include:
- detailed overview of current, credit and savings accounts,
- all domestic and foreign currency payments inside and outside Erste Bank,
- buy and sell of foreign currency at a more favorable exchange rate,
- review of credit card accounts and card management (possibility of blocking and unblocking cards, changing daily limits, managing channels of use at ATMs and points of sale)
- balance transfer between accounts (between accounts and authorized accounts of other physical entities in Erste Bank),
- contracting and updating standing orders,
- possibility of payment by scanning and showing the QR code.



The application also allows you to:
- two-way communication with the bank - the possibility of sending and receiving messages from the bank through the Virtual Inbox,
- personal profile management, PIN change and other settings.

Апликација мПорези пружа могућност једноставног, лаког и брзог информисања о порезима, пореским законима који се тичу обрачуна и плаћања пореза, новостима у пореским прописима и свим другим актуелностима из делокруга рада Пореске управе Републике Србије.
Путем апликације мПорези може се приступити електронским сервисима Пореске управе и извршити увид у поднете пореске пријаве, проследити захтев за Упитом стања на пореским рачунима, проследити захтев за добијање пореског Уверења, доделити/одузети овлашћење за електронско пословање.
Електронски сервиси Пореске управе доступни су сваког дана у периоду од 6 часова ујутро до 24 часа у поноћ.
Приступ електронским сервисима Пореске управе путем апликације мПорези врши се уз помоћ QR кода.
Путем апликације мПорези тренутно није могуће подношење пореских пријава и електронско плаћање пореских обавеза.
Апликација омогућава претрагу ПИБ регистра пореских обвезника и добијање основних информација о сваком пореском обвезнику који се налази у Јединственом регистру пореских обвезника Пореске управе.
Апликација пружа увид у Јавне набавке Пореске управе.
Путем апликације порески обвезници се могу информисати о новостима и саопштењима Пореске управе
Апликација пружа увид у Порески календар ради информисања о роковима за измирење пореских обавеза
Апликација садржи адресар организационих јединица Пореске управе, као и контакт формулар путем којег је могуће поставити питање или упутити примедбу Пореској управи.
У оквиру апликације мПорези постоји систем нотификација – обавештења – које корисници могу самостално подешавати, зависно од тога коју врсту обавештење желе да добију путем апликације мПорези, тј. путем свог мобилног уређаја.

Mobile application mBank BPS – mobile banking Banka Poštanska štedionica AD Banja Luka offers the following features and functionality:

- Detailed information on all your accounts in the Bank
- Review of  balances and turnover  on current and other accounts, all cards accounts  and term deposits
- Perform all payments and transfer within the Bank, and other banks in BiH
- Use of the foreign exchange, ie. buying and selling foreign currency
- Use templates for payments.  Same templates  can be used in two services mBank BPS Web and e-banking BPS
- Foreign exchange rates info
- Using the loan and savings calculator for informational purposes only
- Customer support via e-mail, contact phone and via the website
 
Benefits of using mobile application mBank BPS:
- More favorable fees for execution of orders
- Saving time
- Availability 0/24
- Maximum security and reliability
- Use the application wherever you have access to the Internet
- Simple, intuitive and efficient use of applications

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Mobilna aplikacija mBank BPS – mobilno bankarsto Banka Poštanska štedionica AD Banja Luka nudi sledeće mogućnosti i funkcionalnosti:

- Detaljne informacije o svim računima otvorenim u Banci
- Pregled stanja i prometa po  tekućem i ostalim računima, te računima kartica i svih oročenja
- Obavljanje svih plaćanja i prenosa unutar Banke, te u drugim bankama u BiH
- Korištenja mjenjačnice, tj. kupovine i prodaje deviza
- Korištenja šablona za plaćanje Iste šablone je moguće koristiti u dvije usluge mBank BPS i Web  e-banking BPS
- Informativni pregled Kursne liste
- Korištenje kalkulatora kredita i štednje u informativne svrhe
- Korisničku podršku putem mail-a,kontakt telefona i preko website-a
 
Prednosti korištenja mobilne aplikacije mBank BPS:
- Povoljnije naknade za realizaciju naloga
- Ušteda vremena
- Dostupnost 0/24
- Maksimalna sigurnost i pouzdanost
- Korištenje aplikacije gdje je god omogućen pristup Internetu
- Jednostavno,  intuitivno i efikasno korištenje aplikacije

Coinbase is the global leader and only crypto company listed in the S&P 500 to seamlessly buy, sell, trade, store, and stake crypto. We’re the only publicly traded crypto exchange in the U.S.

SUPPORTED ASSETS¹
Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), USD Coin (USDC), Cardano (ADA), Polygon (MATIC), Polkadot (DOT), Solana (SOL), Tether (USDT), Uniswap (UNI), Dogecoin (DOGE), Pepe (PEPE), and hundreds of other cryptocurrencies.

Here’s a little taste of what Coinbase offers:

COINBASE ONE
Get more out of crypto with Coinbase One.
- Zero trading fees², priority support, and more.³ 

BUY, SELL & MANAGE CRYPTO
- Coinbase is a global leading platform to build, manage, and track your crypto portfolio.
- Send and receive crypto.
- Stake crypto and earn yield on cryptocurrencies like Ethereum and Cardano¹
- Set up automatic or recurring buys.
- Follow the latest crypto news and track prices.
- Transfer crypto internationally.

PUBLICLY TRADED CRYPTO EXCHANGE
- Coinbase is the only publicly traded, US-headquartered crypto exchange (NASDAQ: COIN).
- Our financials are public and audited quarterly by a Big 4 accounting firm.
- Encryption and security are at the core of our platform, and our security team is constantly working to make sure you and your assets are protected from emerging threats.

POWERFUL TOOLS FOR ADVANCED CRYPTO TRADERS
- Buy and sell crypto using advanced trading tools and earn staking rewards¹
- Access in-depth technical analysis, advanced real-time order books, and charting powered by TradingView.
- Advanced tools to research and analyze crypto markets to inform trading decisions.

NEED MORE HELP?
Visit help.coinbase.com for information and to contact Coinbase Support.

PRIVACY
View Coinbase’s legal privacy policy at https://www.coinbase.com/legal/privacy

You earn rewards from the protocol, not Coinbase. Coinbase acts only as a service provider connecting you, the validators, and the protocol. We pass along any rewards earned from staking, minus a transparent Coinbase fee.

Fleur is a cute and simple budget planner and tracker app. The app allows you to easily add daily expenses and income. You can also set a monthly budget, create multiple accounts and track your debt. Fleur is an all in one app that will help you manage your money.

Key Features:
- Minimal, elegant, and aesthetically pleasing design
- Easily log expenses and income
- Set a monthly budget
- View insights and understand spending habits
- View transaction history
- Add repeating transactions
- Create new categories
- iCloud sync
- No sign in required
- Easy search and filter

Read more about our Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy here:
https://fleurbudget.com/privacy_terms.html

We are always there for you!
- If you are facing any issues or have questions, please feel free to email us. Hope you enjoy using our app as much as we do! :)
